camera_gear.model: Sony A7R V / Canon EOS R5 / Fujifilm GFX 100S
camera_gear.lens: Tilt-Shift Wide-Angle TS-E 24mm f/3.5L II / PC Nikkor 24mm f/3.5D

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Late afternoon/Early evening (4:00-5:30 PM), approaching sunset but not yet twilight
lighting_setup.weather: Clear, soft diffused daylight with warm sunlight
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Sunlight front from camera left/west, creating strong rim light on building
lighting_setup.quality: Diffused, high-key sunlight, no harsh shadows
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Warm interior retail lighting (3000K) visible through ground floor shopfronts creating inviting glow, subtle warm highlights in building

color_grading.palette: Sky with subtle dark blue gradient, warm amber interior glows against cool exterior
color_grading.saturation: Medium-high saturation, gentle and restrained color palette
color_grading.contrast: Medium contrast, lifted shadows for detail in street level

texture_quality.details: Muted Urban Tones, grey blue shadow, glass transparency showing interior activity, pedestrian motion blur, asphalt texture with road markings
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Clear glazed shopfront at ground level, asphalt road surface, grey brick paved sidewalk

composition_guide.type: Three-quarter corner view from across street, environmental context including adjacent buildings and street activity, slight perspective convergence toward building corner

atmosphere.mood: Quiet urban evening transition, gentle everyday beauty, understated Modern architectural elegance
atmosphere.feeling: Calm, approachable, residential comfort mixed with urban vitality, winter clarity and crispness

technical_quality.post_processing: Tilt-shift perspective correction maintaining vertical lines, clarity enhancement on facade texture, color temperature balancing between cool exterior and warm interior, subtle highlight recovery on sky, gentle dehaze for atmospheric softness
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight balanced slightly warm (5600K) to preserve soft evening light quality, preserving cool sky tones while maintaining warmth in artificial lighting
technical_quality.tone: High-key tonal curve with lifted blacks, compressed contrast for gentle aesthetic, mid-tone emphasis, avoiding pure blacks
technical_quality.vignette: No vignette or extremely subtle (-5%) to maintain open, airy feel
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High dynamic range (14+ stops) capturing detail in bright sky gradations and simultaneously in shadowed street and building recesses, balanced exposure preserving window interior details
